assignment_path.description: The path to the zip file containing the assignment downloaded from Prarie Learn

comment.description: A comment attached to this report generated by MOSS. Corresponds to MOSS -c option

number_of_matches_to_show.description: The number of matches to show in the report generated

language.description: The language the problem is in

max_appearances.description: The maximum number of times a code segment can appear before it is ignored. If a code segment appears many times it is likely to be the result of legitimate sharing
